description:
A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter.

inspire from https://grafana.com/dashboards/2587 & k6 cloud dashboard.

simple & informative dashboard

targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "vus_max" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "iterations" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201') AND $timeFilter group by time(${interval_value}s)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201') AND $timeFilter group by time(${interval_value}s)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as MEAN, sum("value") as Successful, count("value")-sum("value") as Failed FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "check", "group"
SELECT min("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0
SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT median("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("value", 99) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") / 1024 / 1024  FROM "endpoint_data_recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") / 1024 / 1024 FROM "endpoint_data_sent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/${interval_value} FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s), "check" fill(none)
SELECT max("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s)  fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s)  fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s)  fill(none)
SELECT min("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s)  fill(none)
SELECT sum("value")/${interval_value} FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "iterations" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") / 1024 / 1024 AS "value_MB" FROM "endpoint_data_recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT percentile("value", 95) as PERCENTILE_95, percentile("value", 99) as PERCENTILE_99, max("value") as  max_response_time, mean("value") as  avg_response_time, min("value") as  min_response_time, count("value") as  count   FROM "http_req_duration"  WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "name","status","method"
SELECT "value" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_req_duration" WITH KEY = "name"
list.label: URL
list.name: URL
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_req_duration" WITH KEY = "name"

title: K6 Dashboard
